title: How to Automate Data Classification in PostgreSQL With OpenAI
author: Team Timescale
description: Data classification is a crucial but challenging task. Learn how to automate it in PostgreSQL using open-source extensions & OpenAI models.
cntitle: 如何使用OpenAI自动分类PostgreSQL中的数据
cndescription: 数据分类是一项至关重要但极具挑战性的任务。学习如何使用开源扩展和OpenAI模型在PostgreSQL中实现自动化。
